Player History
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 3/3/1987 to a minor league contract.
Traded from St. Louis to Atlanta on 4/3/1987 (Going to STL: CF Dale Murphy. Going to ATL: P Anthony Telford, 2B Delino Deshields, RF Bernard Gilkey, 3B Doug DeCinces)...
Traded from Atlanta to St. Louis on 4/18/1990 (Going to STL: P Woody Williams, P Scott Ruskin, 2B Delino Deshields. Going to ATL: P Danny Cox)...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/12/1990, off Greg Maddux (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/13/1990, off Jeff Fassero (CHC)...
